document.full_text: the 9,000-pound (4,100 kg) co-star of the new reese witherspoon drama "water for elephants" was abused by its trainers, according to a group that is urging a boycott of the movie.
document.title: group claims elephant in witherspoon film was abused
lines_and_colors: the 9,000-pound (4,100 kg) co-star of the new reese witherspoon drama "water for elephants" was abused by its trainers, according to a group that is urging a boycott of the movie.
